title: BRIEF-Capitaland Says Co Partners Navinfo Datatech And TPG Telecom To Set Up 5G Smart Estate Trial Site
text:
BRIEF-Capitaland Says Co Partners Navinfo Datatech And TPG Telecom To Set Up 5G Smart Estate Trial Site

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 19:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Capitaland Says Co Partners Navinfo Datatech And TPG Telecom To Set Up 5G Smart Estate Trial Site Oct 17 (Reuters) - Capitaland Ltd : * PARTNERS NAVINFO DATATECH AND TPG TELECOM TO SET UP SINGAPORE'S LARGEST 5G SMART ESTATE TRIAL SITE * TPG TELECOM TO DEPLOY ADVANCED 5G TRIAL NETWORK WITH BETTER THAN 99% 3.5GHZ OUTDOOR COVERAGE ACROSS SINGAPORE SCIENCE PARKS 1 & 2 BY 2020 * PROJECTS SUPPORTED UNDER A S$40 MILLION FUND BY IMDA AND NATIONAL RESEARCH FOUNDATION

BRIEF-Capitaland Says Co Partners Navinfo Datatech And TPG Telecom To Set Up 5G Smart Estate Trial Site
description: BRIEF-Capitaland Says Co Partners Navinfo Datatech And TPG Telecom To Set Up 5G Smart Estate Trial Site
